channel.title: Rust on Connor Bryan
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Connor Bryan

item.title: Creating a Quantum Circuit Simulator
item.author: connor.bryan@zeos.system (Connor Bryan)
item.description: Recently, I’ve been researching quantum mechanics, especially around quantum computing and I’ve been following a textbook on quantum machine learning. After using Python libraries like Cirq for the creation of circuits, I had the thought of creating a library in a language I enjoy using like Rust. The goal of the first draft of the simulator was to create a simple Bell state circuit. This project has a bunch of parts;
